name: tinyimg
title: TinyIMG
description: Compress your images on your own device, with no data sent to our servers.
author: wuyax

commands.name: tinyimg
commands.title: Compress Selected Images
commands.description: Compress selected images, save to the same folder.

preferences.name: quality
preferences.title: Quality
preferences.description: The quality of the compressed image

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
